title: Universal bitwise function composition from Church numerals in lambda calculus
excerpt: Explores mapping Church numerals to arbitrary bitwise function compositions using SK combinators. Introduces binary numerals to generically construct unary and binary bitwise operations, leveraging fixed-point combinators for recursion and a new successor-based conversion method.

title: Cellular automata generation of 3D printer infill
excerpt: Introduces a CA-based method for generating optimized 3D printer infill structures. Implements voxel-based modeling with Marching Cubes to produce STL files, achieving lightness, flexibility, and strength compared to traditional geometric patterns.

title: Constructing combinators for arithmetic and arbitrary-length bitwise operations
excerpt: Investigates SK combinators for arithmetic on Church numerals, introducing efficient combinators and a novel construction method for arbitrary-length binary representations supporting bitwise operations. Includes complexity analysis and performance comparisons for arithmetic operations.
